Package org.springframework.social.yammer.api

Interface Summary
GroupOperations Sub-API for all Group related methods
MessageOperations Sub-API for all message related operations
SearchOperations Sub-API for search operations
SubscriptionOperations Sub-API for subscriptions (following/unfollowing).
ThreadOperations Sub-API for Thread operations
TopicOperations Sub-API for topic operations
UserOperations Sub-API for User related operations
